text: Red Hot doing some rpg music
author: Astor Deviagge

text: ACE? So, the band that made half of Xenoblade Chronicles titles, including Gaur Plain?
author: Ivain

text: That is correct! Specifically, ACE refers to the composers Chico Yamanaka and Tomori Kudo, who made the soundtracks for Emil Chronicle and Bomberman 64: The Second Attack. ACE+ refers to Kenji Hiramatsu joining them, and they made a lot of the Xenoblade Chronicles soundtrack.
author: LordMyoo

text: Thanks a lot! While you're at it, could you tell me which of their soundtracks you would recommend? I'm looking for good VGM of any kind for a little project. I guess Emil Chronicle is a good lead anyway but I'd still like an expert opinion.
author: Ivain

text: The Xenoblade Chronicles soundtrack is easily my favourite of their work, though all the Emil Chronicle Online themes that Supra has uploaded are really really good as well (check out the "See also"-list in the video description). : ) If you want any other recommendations for your project you can send me a message (better to keep the comment section uncluttered) or just keep browsing Supra's list; he's got fantastic taste in VGM.
